title: Boris Johnson's Conservatives lose safe North Shropshire seat in by-election
content:
1. Boris Johnson's Conservatives lose safe North Shropshire seat in by-election  The Washington Post
  2. Voters punish scandal-hit Boris Johnson's party with crushing loss in 'safe' seat  NBC News
  3. Tories lose North Shropshire seat they held for nearly 200 years  BBC News
  4. The Lib Dem win in North Shropshire gives hope the Tories can be beaten  The Independent
  5. People are angry – and now we’ve shown that Johnson’s Tories can be beaten anywhere  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Boris Johnson's Conservatives lose safe North Shropshire seat in by-election  The Washington Post
Voters punish scandal-hit Boris Johnson's party with crushing loss in 'safe' seat  NBC News
Tories lose North Shropshire seat they held for nearly 200 years  BBC News
The Lib Dem win in North Shropshire gives hope the Tories can be beaten  The Independent
People are angry – and now we’ve shown that Johnson’s Tories can be beaten anywhere  The Guardian
